text: Luther is a 1964 movie about the life of Martin Luther. The movie starred Terry Norris as Luther. == Plot == The movie is a version of John Osborne's biographical play, presenting the life of Martin Luther. ==Related pages== * Luther film == Other websites == * * MemorabletTV.com - Australian TV - Labor In Power to Luther Category:1964 movies Category:Movies about Martin Luther Category:1960s English-language movies Category:English-language television programs
title: Luther (1964 movie)
